results.title: Outrageous fortune
results.creator_credit: Arthur Hiller, Robert W. Cort, Ted Field, Interscope communications and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: A madcap comedy involving a menage a trois and espionage. Two actresses who don’t get along with each other, Sandy (Bette Midler) and Lauren (Shelley Long) find out they are both dating the same man, Michael (Peter Coyote). All hell breaks loose when they discover that Michael is a spy working for a foreign government and that he has implicated them both in his schemes. Cast includes Robert Prosky, John Schuck, George Carlin.

results.title: Ruthless people
results.creator_credit: David Zucker, Jerry Zucker, Jim Abrahams, Michael Peyser, Silver Screen Partners II, Touchstone Pictures and Wagner Productions
results.brief_description: A black comedy tale of two kindly kidnappers, Ken and Sandy Kessler, exacting revenge on the rip-off merchant Sam (Danny DeVito) by taking his spoilt rich wife, Barbara (Bette Midler) as hostage. However when the Kesslers try to claim their ransom, the obnoxious and spiteful Sam, who is delighted at the opportunity to be rid of the wife he hates so much, refuses to pay. Barbara joins forces with the Kesslers and together they plan their revenge. Cast includes Judge Reinhold, Helen Slater, Anita Morris and Bill Pullman in his debut performance.

results.title: Miami rhapsody
results.creator_credit: David Frankel, Barry Jossen and Hollywood Pictures
results.brief_description: This hilariously sexy comedy has critics everywhere standing and cheering! The irresistible Sarah Jessica Parker (Honeymoon in Vegas, L.A. story) stars as Gwyn Marcus - a recently-engaged young woman about to make a shockingly funny discovery: marriage and fidelity don’t always go hand-in-hand, especially in her own family! From then on, it’s comical chaos as one by one, Gwyn unravels the details of their outrageously tangled affairs. Stars Sarah Jessica Parker, Mia Farrow, and Antonio Banderas.

results.title: Six days seven nights
results.creator_credit: Ivan Reitman, Roger Birnbaum, Wallis Nicita and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: The perfect scenario - a remote island vacation with the man you love. He proposes, you say yes, life is wonderful. Then you are called away to do a one-day shoot in Tahiti and suddenly your life changes. High-powered New York magazine editor Robin Monroe (Anne Heche) finds herself in this very situation when the plane, engaged for the one-day shoot and piloted by the rough and ready Quinn Harris (Harrison Ford), is forced to land in stormy weather on an unknown remote island. Robin and Quinn are left to deal with each other, with survival and an uncertain future, whilst Robin’s boyfriend Frank (David Schwimmer) and Quinn’s girlfriend Angelica (Jacqueline Obradors) share their fears and concern at the hotel bar. Filmed on location on the Hawaiian island of Kauai. Cast also includes Allison Janney, Temuera Morrison.

results.title: Inspector Gadget
results.creator_credit: David Kellogg, Andy Heyward, Jordan Kerner, Roger Birnbaum, Caravan Pictures and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description: A remake of the popular children’s animated TV series, this family oriented comedy, traces Gadget’s history as a mild-mannered security guard, reborn as super-detective, Inspector Gadget, able to foil criminals with his innumerable tools - which due to a freak incident - are now a part of his body. Gadget seeks to bring down the evil Dr Claw, (played with charm by Rupert Everett) - the man responsible for his transformation. Also stars Joely Fisher as Gadget’s romantic interest and Matthew Broderick as Inspector Gadget.

results.title: Hero
results.creator_credit: Zhang Yimou, Bill Kong, Beijing New Picture Film Company, EDKO Film and Elite Films
results.brief_description: Famed director Zhang Yimou delivers a spectacular martial art masterpiece that, in the style of “Roshomon”, presents a tale from numerous perspectives. Set during the Warring States period (when China was divided into seven states) the film supports various strands - a nameless soldier (Jet Li) embarks upon a dangerous quest to avenge his massacred people; a lone female warrior seeks to match the exacting standards of her master; two legendary assassins, who are also lovers, play out their final act. The graphics and set pieces of the film rival those of “Crouching tiger, hidden dragon”, being quite spectacular in nature, with an outstanding colour palette, depicted thematically. Highlights are the female warriors fighting in an autumnal forest, a lakeside showdown and the mountain top finale for the lovers. Bolstered by a top cast (Jet Li, Maggie Cheung, Tony Leung, Zhang Ziyi) Yimou creates an exciting addition to the wuxia genre, whilst sustaining a lyrical, romantic and elegiac tone.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zhang Yimou, Bill Kong, Beijing New Picture Film Company, EDKO Film and Elite Films

results.title: [Safe] = Safe [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Todd Haynes, Christine Vachon, Lauren Zalaznick and Chemical Films
results.brief_description: ‘Homemaker’ Carol White lives an ensconced life with her husband and step-son in the wealthy outer suburbs of Los Angeles. Yet her domestic bliss is marred by allergic reactions which gradually worsen into severe attacks and exhaustion triggered by sources as disparate as car exhaust, beauty products and bug spray. Failing to find any medical explanation for her maladies, her doctor refers her to a psychiatrist, who suggests that her physical ailments are psychosomatic and that she is in a state of hysteria - a theory echoed by her callous and increasingly frustrated husband. Carol herself becomes convinced that she is suffering from ‘multiple chemical sensitivity’ or ‘20th century disease’- an immune system disorder which make the body vulnerable to the low-level toxins and forms of pollution that are part of modern life. Unable to adequately perform her expected gender role, she withdraws to an expensive New Age retreat where the community’s guru champions a dubious regimen of diet, climate control, introspection, and self-love. Yet this move does little to improve her physical or mental state. Is it possible that the illness that so disrupts the order of her world is far less dangerous than the cure to restore it? Suggesting parallels between Carol’s illness and AIDS, Hayne’s offers a sharp critique of both traditional and alternative approaches that attempt to pigeonhole ‘baffling’ illnesses to further their own agendas. Cast includes Julianne Moore, Peter Friedman, Susan Norman, Xander Berkeley and James LeGros.

results.title: Deep blue sea
results.creator_credit: Renny Harlin, Akiva Goldsman, Alan Richie, Don MacBain, Robert Kosberg, Tony Ludwig and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer’s disease a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the bait as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back. Cast includes Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, LL Cool J, Jacqueline McKenzie, Michael Rapaport, Stellan Skarsgard, Aida Turturro.

results.title: Popeye
results.creator_credit: Robert Altman, Robert Evans and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: The comic strip and animated sailor hero with a thing for spinach comes to life in this meticulous live action kids film. Director Robert Altman traces the origins of Popeye, his battle against arch-rival Bluto and his budding romance with Olive Oyl. Cast includes Robin Williams, Shelley Duvall, Ray Walston, Paul L. Smith, Paul Dooley.

results.title: The Island of Dr Moreau
results.creator_credit: John Frankenheimer, Edward Pressman and New Line Cinema
results.brief_description: Dr. Moreau is brilliant geneticist on the brink of superseding evolution. When a UN diplomat visits the island laboratory he discovers experiments turning animal life forms into human-like beasts. The beasts revolt, threatening not only the island but ultimately all mankind.

constellations_other.name: Migrations
constellations_other.description: Universal Everything's Migrations features fantastical creatures born from elements of other animals, just like the titles in this Constellation.

constellations_other.name: Doctors of Evil
constellations_other.description: Villains get all the best lines and if they're mad scientists, they get all the best toys too. Evil Dr Ironstein from Flight of the Amazon Queen is one member of long lineage of science supervillains.

results.creator_credit_for_label: John Frankenheimer, Edward Pressman and New Line Cinema
results.description: Dr. Moreau is brilliant geneticist on the brink of superseding evolution. When a UN diplomat visits the island laboratory he discovers experiments turning animal life forms into human-like beasts. The beasts revolt, threatening not only the island but ultimately all mankind. Adapted from the H.G. Wells story. Cast includes Val Kilmer, Marlon Brando, David Thewlis, Fairuza Balk, Ron Perlman, Temuera Morrison.
